name: slog-viewer
description: Beautiful structured log viewer for debugging. Automatically formats JSON/logfmt logs with syntax highlighting, filtering, and search. Works with any language (Go slog, Node.js pino, Python structlog, etc.)

viewsWelcome.contents:
No logs yet.

Start debugging to see formatted structured logs.

[Start Debugging](command:workbench.action.debug.start)

slogViewer.enabled.description: Enable automatic formatting of JSON logs

slogViewer.collapseJSON.description: Show JSON collapsed by default (click to expand)

slogViewer.showOriginal.description: Show original JSON log alongside formatted output

slogViewer.maxLogEntries.description: Maximum number of log entries to keep in memory

slogViewer.autoScroll.description: Automatically scroll to the latest log entry

slogViewer.theme.description: Theme for the log viewer (auto uses VSCode theme)

scripts.copy-webview: mkdir -p dist/webview && cp src/webview/*.html src/webview/*.css src/webview/*.js dist/webview/
